name: Covid Factory
description:
Welcome to Covid Factory.

You've always been an entrepreneur and now is your chance!

As COVID-19 ravages the world, your turning to making Packs of Toilet Roll, Hand Sanitiser and more! Chop, Collect, Craft and Sell in this new and fantastic tycoon.

This game was created by Angry Caterpillar Team 1 - A new team formed for the Quarantine Game Jam and what a fantastic job they have done in the time given.

Angry Caterpillar™ - Lead Developer
https://angrycaterpillar.com

Maxes - Programmer
https://maxes.itch.io/

v3ct0r173 - Programmer & 2D Pixel Artist
https://v3ct0r173.itch.io/

Luckyoctopus - 2D Pixel Artist
https://luckyoctopus.itch.io/

Rediezminor88 - Musician
https://rediezminor.itch.io/

Thank you for your support. We look forward to your votes and are sure that you will enjoy this game.

Game Controls:

Menu = E (3 x Tabs - Inventory, Buy and Sell)
Chop Wood = Left Mouse Click
Place = Right Mouse Click
Drop = A
Zoom = Mouse Wheel Scroll
Pan = Spacebar & Left Mouse Click & Drag

Built for Microsoft Windows.
